title: How to cite a book with two authors - Quora

response.answer_text: As ever, this will vary depending on the citation standard you’re expected to use. Make sure that you’re using the right one, because otherwise it will get very complicated. In the standard I use, the first author’s surname is reversed (in the bibliography, anyway), while the second one is not. Thus “Misiunas, Romualdas and Rein Taagepera” or “Eatwell, Roger and Matthew Goodwin”. Then it’s a case of adding in dates of publication, titles, and the rest of it.
